Title: 37052 - Butt Out: # Ways You Can Benefit by Switching to Vaporizers
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 ways traditional smokers can benefit by switching to vaporizers. There have been many studies on how vaporizers can reduce the harm that cigarettes cause. Talk about how they reduce the harm as well as other ways that vaporizers are a better option for traditional cigarette smokers. You can talk about lack of odor, flavor options, etc. You can place the client link by mentioning that vaporizers have evolved over the years and they have recently even come out with a smartphone vaporizer. Your target is tech-savvy people.
Target URL: This is no Vape Case: A Smartphone Tailored to Your Tastes
